author: cvuosalo
body: #11068 was intended as a simple clean-up to replace certain wildcards in `keep` statements with explicit strings, but in the process a `keep` statement for recoCSCHaloData was accidentally deleted in RecoMET_EventContent_cff.py. This PR restores this missing CSC halo data to AOD.
title: Restore CSCHaloData to AOD, which was inadvertently deleted by PR 11068
